annotations.description: Audrey Saunders is arguably one of the most famous bartenders in New York. She has an impressive amount of Modern Classic cocktails to her name and I am asha...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Intro to Aperol

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Aperol
1oz (30ml) Gin
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
2 dashes Angostura Bitters

or

2oz (60ml) Aperol
1oz(30ml) Gin
.25oz (7.5ml) Simple Syrup
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
2 Dashes Angostura Bitters

Shake and pour

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hFZXr9Anm0M
title: Intro to Aperol
